name: Pancakes
instructions: Combine dry ingredients: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar (if using).
Combine wet ingredients: In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg, milk, and melted butter.
Mix wet and dry ingredients: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. The batter should be slightly lumpy.
Cook the pancakes: Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium heat. Pour or scoop about 1/4 cup of batter onto the griddle for each pancake.
Flip and cook: Cook until bubbles form on the surface of the pancakes and the edges are set, then flip and cook until golden brown on the other side.
Serve: Serve the pancakes hot with your favorite toppings, such as butter, syrup, fruit, or whipped cream.
